This guide is a simplified overview of all changes in the [[Update Aquatic]] ({{BE}} 1.4.''x'' and 1.5.''x'' releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with the [[Better Together Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.2.''x'' releases).

Since Update Aquatic was released in 2 separate updates with various changes in between, the guide is split in 2 phases, one for each major update release.

* [[Bedrock Edition guides/Update Aquatic (Phase One)]] - 1.4.''x'' releases
* [[Bedrock Edition guides/Update Aquatic (Phase Two)]] - 1.5.''x'' releases
